page.title: 18A Killamarsh Doctor
page.content: We went to visit Dr.Lipp and we found out afew things about him.His full name is Donald Lipp and he is 52 years old.He lives in an old farm house in Woodall.He is married and has three children called Alistair,Jaqueline and Nicola.One is a doctor,one is a musicisn and the other one is a croupier.He really enjoys his work as he likes meeting people and finding out all about them.He earns about Â£1000 a month and he has always lived in this area.The worst accident he ever saw was on the M1 when a three wheeler was involved and two people died.His favourite drink is beer and his favourite meal is Lasagne.He has a terrier for a pet and his hobbies are gardening and travelling.He has to use all types of equipment and leads a very busy life.
